thread.section_title: Marbles: the Brain Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marbles: the Brain Store | www.marblesthebrainstore.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Marbles: the Brain Store reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Products arrived as promised 5-7 days. I had to pay shipping since free shipping wasn't an option. On the shipment invoice, it showed free shipping. I was also hoping to receive an email when my item shipped but didn't receive one. All and all, I do love the store and the products they sell. I'm so upset that they're closing the stores.
